name: Proper-tea (franboise)
description:
Proper-tea
Pixelles Game Jam - April 2021 Edition

--- * --- * ---

🍵 A Point and Click game about a real estate agent trying to sell a Haunted House.

🍵 Collect the pieces of a broken teacup to appease the ghost and get the house sold!

🍵 Point and Click with your mouse to find the teacup pieces. 

🍵 ESC to pause. 

🍵 Click and drag to view your inventory.

--- * --- * ---

My role: 
Programmer/UI Programmer, Secondary Puzzle Creator

The other participants roles:

Caroline Grégoire: Concept Artist, UI Artist, Game Artist  https://caromakesgames.itch.io/

Diana Zitting-Rioux : Programmer/UI Programmer https://devinea.itch.io/

Julia Dionne : Game Designer, First Puzzle Creator, Narrative Writer,  Sound Designer
